events.name: The Eternal Cycle: A Story of Day and Night

config.text:
When stars whisper ancient secrets
and the moon guards the sleeping world

scenes.name: Act II: The Hour Before Dawn

config.text:
ACT II
The Hour Before Dawn

The world holds its breath
waiting for the sun's return

The sun breaks free from night's embrace
painting the sky with fire and gold

Life awakens in gentle light
as the world begins anew

scenes.name: Act V: High Noon - The Zenith

config.text:
The sun reigns supreme at its throne
bathing the world in brilliant light

The world is painted in liquid gold
as day prepares its final bow

Between day and night, a sacred pause
where colors dance their final waltz

The last light fades from the horizon
as the moon begins its gentle reign

scenes.name: Act IX: Night Returns - The Circle Closes

config.text:
The cycle completes, as it always must
night embraces the world once more

Day and night, light and dark
Forever dancing, forever one
The eternal cycle continues
As it has since time began
And will, until time ends
